text: Trouble In Mind is the second studio album by Welsh singer and songwriter Jodie Marie. It was released on 25 July 2015. Compared to her debut album which had a more pop sound, Trouble In Mind's sound is mainly soul and blues. ==History== The album was recorded at StudiOwz Recording Studio on the Dolwilym estate in Pembrokeshire, Wales. ==Track listing== == Singles == # "Only One I'm Thinking Of" ==References== Category:2015 albums Category:2015 in British music Category:Jodie Marie albums
title: Trouble in Mind (Jodie Marie album)
